text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically asks whether the model analyzes the principle of unreasonable non-disclosure under Schedule 3, paragraph 2(b) of the Land Registration Act 2002, focusing on whether the occupier failed to disclose their interest when they reasonably could have been expected to do so.
